CustomField.description: Optional class to invoke after all workers complete. Used for simple chaining scenarios. The class must implement Callable interface. For complex conditional chaining, use worker.finish() instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of a class to chain to after completion (e.g., TAPTransactionCoordinator). Leave blank if no chaining is needed or if using worker.finish() for custom logic.
CustomField.label: Chain To Class
